name: PC Plays Tanks
description:
A short game where you play as either a blue tank or a red tank.

Blue tank moves with WASD and aims with a mouse.

Red tank can turn faster but can only shoot in 8 directions.

Complete 20 levels to win the game, you start with 5 lives, if you don't want that, type the Konami code.

You can also construct your own levels.

Based on Wii Play Tanks.
